trans-unit.resname: USG·306 | Phyrexian Processor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，支付任意数量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: USG·306 | Phyrexian Processor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}: Create an X/X black Phyrexian Minion creature token, where X is the life paid as CARDNAME entered the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {4}，{T}：派出一个X/X黑色非瑞人／奴仆衍生生物，X为于CARDNAME进战场时所支付的生命数量。

trans-unit.resname: USG·308 | Purging Scythe | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to the creature with the least toughness. If two or more creatures are tied for least toughness, you choose one of them.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，CARDNAME对防御力最低的生物造成2点伤害。若是两个或以上的生物符合此条件，由你决定CARDNAME对那个生物造成伤害。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a soot counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，你可以放置一个油烟指示物在CARDNAME上。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a permanent for each soot counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在每一玩家的维持阶段中，CARDNAME上每有一个油烟指示物，该玩家就必须牺牲一个永久物。

trans-unit.resname: USG·310 | Temporal Aperture | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {5}, {T}: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. Until end of turn, for as long as that card remains on top of your library, play with the top card of your library revealed and you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)
trans-unit.target: 5， T：洗你的牌库，并且展示最顶上的牌。直到回合结束，只要该牌持续留在你牌库顶上，你可以将之视为如同是在你手上一般地使用，并且不须支付施放费用。（若该咒语的施放费用中有X，则X为0。）

trans-unit.resname: USG·311 | Thran Turbine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may add {C}{C}. You can't spend this mana to cast spells.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，你可以加最多两点无色法术力到你的法术力池中。这份法术力不可用来使用咒语。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay 2 life. If they don't, they return a permanent they control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手可以支付2点生命。若其未如此作，则他将一个由其操控的永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: USG·313 | Urza's Armor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.
trans-unit.target: 若任何来源将对你造成伤害，则防止该伤害中的1点。
